Module com.psymk6

Package com.psymk6.util

package com.psymk6.util
Provides utility classes for the SnakeGame application.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.psymk6
    The main package for the SnakeGame application developed by Psymk6.
    com.psymk6.abstracts
    Provides abstract classes for creating models and buttons in a canvas-based application.
    com.psymk6.controllers
    Contains controllers responsible for managing various aspects of the SnakeGame.
    com.psymk6.interfaces
    Provides interfaces used in the SnakeGame application.
    com.psymk6.models
    Contains model classes for the SnakeGame application.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameUtil
    The GameUtil class provides utility methods for handling game-related tasks, such as loading images, rotating images, tinting images, and creating styled buttons.
    ImageUtil
    The ImageUtil class provides utility methods for loading images used in the game.
    MusicPlayer
    The MusicPlayer class provides functionality for playing background music in the game.
    ScoreUtil
    The ScoreUtil class provides utility methods for managing and retrieving game scores.
